languages.text: "Боль и страдания повредили рассудок провидицы — ты не могла спасти Крударах в одиночку".

traits.locale_text: "Боль и страдания повредили рассудок провидицы — ты не могла спасти Крударах в одиночку".

languages.text: "The pain and suffering have damaged the Farseer's mind. You could not have saved Crudarach alone."
languages.original_text: "Боль и страдания повредили рассудок провидицы — ты не могла спасти Крударах в одиночку".

traits.locale_text: "The pain and suffering has damaged the Farseer's mind. You could not have saved Crudarach alone."
"The pain and suffering has damaged the Farseer's mind. You could not have saved Crudarach alone."
"The pain and suffering have damaged the Farseer's mind. You could not have saved Crudarach alone."
"The pain and suffering have damaged the Farseer's mind. You could not have saved Crudarach alone."
"The pain and suffering have damaged the Farseer's mind. You could not have saved Crudarach alone."

languages.text: «El dolor y el sufrimiento han perturbado la mente de esta vidente. No podrías haber salvado Crudarach tú sola».
languages.original_text: "The pain and suffering have damaged the Farseer's mind. You could not have saved Crudarach alone."

traits.locale_text: «El dolor y el sufrimiento han perturbado la mente de esta vidente. No podrías haber salvado Crudarach tú sola».

languages.text: 「先見司は痛みと苦しみで精神を傷つけられていた。お前一人ではクルダラを救えなかっただろう」
languages.original_text: "The pain and suffering have damaged the Farseer's mind. You could not have saved Crudarach alone."

traits.locale_text: 「先見司は痛みと苦しみで精神を傷つけられていた。お前一人ではクルダラを救えなかっただろう」

languages.text: “痛苦与折磨毒害了这位先知的心灵。就算你回去了，凭你一个人的力量，也拯救不了克鲁达拉赫。”
languages.original_text: "The pain and suffering have damaged the Farseer's mind. You could not have saved Crudarach alone."

traits.locale_text: “痛苦与折磨毒害了这位先知的心灵。就算你回去了，凭你一个人的力量，也拯救不了克鲁达拉赫。”

languages.text: « La douleur et la souffrance ont entamé l'esprit du Grand Prophète. Vous n'auriez pas pu sauver Crudarach seule. »
languages.original_text: "The pain and suffering have damaged the Farseer's mind. You could not have saved Crudarach alone."

traits.locale_text: « La douleur et la souffrance ont entamé l'esprit du Grand Prophète. Vous n'auriez pas pu sauver Crudarach seule. »

languages.text: "Der Schmerz und das Leid haben dem Geist der Runenprophetin stark zugesetzt. Ihr hättet Crudarach nicht allein retten können."
languages.original_text: "The pain and suffering have damaged the Farseer's mind. You could not have saved Crudarach alone."

traits.locale_text: "Der Schmerz und das Leid haben dem Geist der Runenprophetin stark zugesetzt. Ihr hättet Crudarach nicht allein retten können."

languages.text: "Çektiği acı ve eziyet, Ötesezen'in zihnine hasar vermiş olmalı. Crudarach'ı tek başına kurtaramazdın."
languages.original_text: "The pain and suffering have damaged the Farseer's mind. You could not have saved Crudarach alone."

traits.locale_text: "Çektiği acı ve eziyet, Ötesezen'in zihnine hasar vermiş. Crudarach'ı tek başına kurtaramazdın."
